title: Interpretation of a dream about an unmarried bride

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about an unmarried bride: It is one of the things that contains more good than evil that the dream may indicate, if the dream in general contains joy and happiness and is free of unusual incidents. Therefore, the Encyclopedia website presents to you in this article the interpretation of a dream about marriage for an unmarried girl. Interpretation of a dream about an unmarried bride. Tomorrow the unmarried girl saw in her dream that she was sitting in her house, where an atmosphere of sadness prevailed. Then strangers came to celebrate the wedding inside the house and she was the bride, and this means that There is an end to them and an end to a period of sorrows in this girl’s life. If this girl is sick in reality, this means a speedy recovery, God willing. It is the opposite of the interpretation of a dream in which joy prevails, but people do not feel happy within themselves, and this means the loss of a family member. Soon. It is never a good dream of greatness, for a girl to see that there are some members of her family. He gave her a wedding dress and the girl feels very surprised, and this means that the girl will soon propose to her, a young man she did not know before. But it will be a happy marriage, God willing. As for the surprise or fear that she felt in the dream, it is because she will say goodbye to the life of celibacy. And enter the golden cage, which is a completely new life that you cannot imagine living in in one day. As for those who think that she is a very beautiful bride and the wedding ceremony is elegant and as she wants, but she sat down. She cries, this is almost evidence of comfort. And that there is happy news that she will hear, and her next life will be as beautiful as she saw herself in the dream. And whoever sees that one of her family members is getting married, this always indicates the end of the period of disagreement and everyone enters a period of reconciliation and the beginning of a new relationship. As for whoever sees in The dream is of a girl whom she does not know. She is the bride and she was wearing a very beautiful wedding dress. The dreamer was very impressed with the dress, which means that the dreamer will earn a lot of money very soon. The source of this money will not be imagined by the girl before and it will surprise her. As for whoever sees a young girl of child age wearing Wedding dress, it means that there is someone in her life. He is always trying to take more responsibility than her and this may be a sign of psychological and emotional abuse from someone. Therefore, we must be careful not to be the tool that others use to achieve what they want. Interpretation of a dream about a bride without Groom: Interpretation of a dream about a bride for an unmarried woman who sees that she is happy but without a groom, means that there is disappointment that she will feel from the people closest to her. If you are wearing a torn and dirty dress in the dream, this is a sign of a major financial loss. Therefore, she should be careful about her relationship With others and to spend money as well so that the dream does not come true and she faces a big problem. The absent groom in the dream also shows the number of problems that the girl will face in her life. This does not have to be in her love life, but it can be in her working life and studies as well. She may encounter many things You will stand in front of her if she has great ambition. Whoever saw in her dream that the dress was beautiful and new, but

title: Interpretation of seeing images in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing pictures in a dream or a dream through a website. A vision indicates the presence of enemies in the life of the fortuneteller. Personal pictures show self-confidence and strength of character. Pictures with a group of friends are evidence of success and success. We will explain in detail. Interpretation of seeing pictures in a dream for a married, single, and pregnant woman. In a dream for a married man, an unmarried young man, and an unmarried girl. Married, married, and pregnant women, as well as divorced and widowed, by providing interpretations by major commentators such as Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin. , for 'This is with us on the Roya website. What is the interpretation of seeing pictures in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: Seeing pictures in a dream indicates many relationships and friendships for the viewer. Seeing pictures in black indicates old relationships or friendships that have become memories. Seeing the pictures market In a dream, bad deeds and falsehood are announced. Seeing faded pictures indicates fragile and weak social relationships that can be broken. Seeing pictures of childhood or youth expresses pessimism, psychological fears, and ambition for a better life. Seeing developments in pictures indicates searching for new friends or relationships. What is the interpretation of seeing pictures in a dream for a single woman? Looking at a girl’s picture: It indicates the presence of people in her life who cause her harm and abuse. Seeing a framed picture in a dream for a single woman indicates the large number of relationships that the girl enters into, which lead to failure. What is the interpretation of seeing pictures in a dream for a married woman: See pictures of a dream A married woman: It indicates the presence of many friends in her life and many social relationships. Seeing ugly pictures of a married woman in a dream indicates troubles and troubles in her life. Seeing pictures hanging in a dream of a married woman shows that she is an indifferent woman and does not take responsibility for her children or her home. What is the interpretation of seeing pictures In a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing pictures in a dream about a pregnant woman expresses feelings of joy and happiness and her going through problems and crises. Seeing ugly pictures in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates problems and fears in her life. Seeing childhood pictures in a dream about pregnancy expresses fear of the present and future and longing for memories of the past. What Interpretation of seeing pictures in a dream for a divorced woman: Seeing pictures in a divorced dream indicates the presence of enemies in her life who may harm her. Seeing personal pictures in a divorced woman’s dream indicates self-respect and strength of character in the case of beautiful pictures, and in the case of ugly pictures it indicates exposure to injustice and rejection of reality. Seeing Of old photos, it indicates the worries and problems that a divorced woman lives in and nostalgia for the past. What is the interpretation of taking photos in a dream for a single woman: See uploading photos of singles. It indicates a strong personality and high self-confidence. Seeing a bad girl taking photos indicates that there are bad people in her life and that Some people harass her. What is the interpretation of a dream about pictures in the sky: Seeing pictures in the sky was beautiful. It indicates the fulfillment of desires and a bright future. Looking at pictures with a group of friends indicates excellence in study or work. We are happy to see

title: Interpretation of seeing an unknown woman giving birth in a dream in different situations

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an unknown woman giving birth in a dream on various occasions. A dream about giving birth is a dream that disturbs your nerves and is uncomfortable, but its interpretation is completely opposite to the feeling of leaving with the dreamer after waking up. Giving birth to a strange woman means that the good days in a person’s life will be full of comfort, happiness and change. An unknown woman gives birth in a dream on various occasions. Interpretation of a dream about seeing an unknown woman giving birth in a dream: Giving birth in a dream generally symbolizes happiness, goodness, pleasure, and joy in the viewer’s life in reality. Dream interpretation scholars have removed the ambiguity of seeing a woman giving birth in a dream that the viewer does not realize through the interpretations contained in interpretation books. Interpretations of seeing an unknown woman giving birth vary depending on the vocabulary surrounding the dream, as it symbolizes comfort and relief from pain, grief, and burdens, and can indicate anxiety and grief. Seeing childbirth in a dream symbolizes getting out of adversity and trouble, or perhaps it indicates division and separation that is occurring between members of the same family. Interpretation of a dream about seeing an unknown woman giving birth in a dream. An unmarried woman. An unmarried woman may dream in a dream of a woman giving birth but she does not know her, which causes her Amazement and questioning. Seeing an unknown woman giving birth to a girl in a dream symbolizes the arrival of good and enjoyable news, and perhaps the happiness that will enter her life, her high status, as well as her academic and professional progress, but if you see that she has given birth to a boy, this does not bode well at all, but rather indicates worries. And the many sorrows that surround her, and God knows best. Dream interpretation scholars indicate that a girl who sees in her dream a woman giving birth to a boy is suffering from an emotional crisis in her life, and most of its impact can be affected by crises in her relationship. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the birth of an unknown woman in a dream about a married woman. All A married woman needs to feel motherly. If she sees in her dream that an unknown woman is giving birth, this may raise doubts about whether she is pregnant or will give birth soon, so let us learn about the meaning of this dream through the following lines: A married woman seeing an unknown woman giving birth in a dream symbolizes the coming of goodness and abundant living. If you have given birth to a child. As for a married woman who sees another woman giving birth to a boy, this indicates the presence of problems in her married life, so she must be careful not to quarrel, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing an unknown woman giving birth in a dream about a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman feels reassured if she sees a woman Another gives birth in her dream, and God guided her, helped her, and eased her affairs, but she wonders about the symbols that this vision carries. This vision symbolizes the removal of sadness and sorrow from the pregnant woman, as well as an easy birth, God willing. This dream indicates that the pregnant woman will soon recover from illness if she is suffering from an illness. This dream indicates stability in the life of a divorced woman in terms of work and a sense of psychological peace. This vision symbolizes the death of worry and distress and almost relief after suffering, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a woman giving birth in front of me in a dream. The meaning of this is different.

title: Interpretation of a dream about henna for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of henna in a dream for a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, or an unmarried girl, whether she is applying henna on the left or right hand, or on the man, according to Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Abdullah. Sincere and more henna in a dream for a married woman. One of the dreams that many married women see in their dreams is to obtain complete adornment for their husbands in our public life, to decorate it and place it on many different areas of the body, including the hand, foot, etc. We will give you an explanation of the interpretation of seeing henna in a dream for a married woman as well. It is interpreted by leading commentators.Interpretation of henna in a dream for a married woman. Seeing henna in a dream for a married woman on her hand, the vision indicates that you will enjoy a happy and stable life with the husband. Henna in the wife’s dream is a sign of the end of problems and disagreements with the husband. Seeing henna in a dream means getting rid of worries and problems. Married woman who sees henna in a dream In the vision, it almost indicates pregnancy, God willing. Seeing henna on the hand in a dream and seeing the hand engraved with henna means the end of difficulties and the end of a good and happy period with the family. Henna on the left hand in the dream is a sign of problems in married life. Seeing henna in the hair in a married woman’s dream A sign of pregnancy in the coming days. Henna in a dream or a married woman’s dream symbolizes fertility, femininity, and beauty, because it indicates the husband’s attraction and love. Seeing henna in a dream also indicates the renewal of emotional life, as well as signs of stagnation in a state of distress, which are social communication and good coexistence. It is also said that she is a friendly and loving woman, as henna in a married man’s dream symbolizes a healthy body, especially longevity. The presence of henna on the feet in a married woman’s dream indicates stability, a successful married life, and the formation of a good family, God willing. Henna inscriptions on the legs in a married woman’s dream It indicates the end of problems between the family. Henna inscription in a dream indicates your success in achieving your goals and fulfilling your desires. Interpretation of henna in a dream for a married woman. Seeing henna in a dream for a married woman who is sick with an illness is evidence that she will fully recover soon and will be in good health. Seeing henna in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence that she She will give birth to a very beautiful child and you will be obedient to her. Applying henna in a dream for a married woman, and it was on her fingers, is evidence of her husband’s great love and how generous he is to her in many matters of life, as he is a loyal person to her. Seeing the dreamer putting henna on her fingers in a dream, and it did not appear at all It is evidence that her husband does not love her and there is an obstacle between them in public life. If henna does not appear on the dreamer’s body in the dream, this is evidence that she will suffer from marital problems due to her husband’s neglect. Interpretation of a dream about henna on the feet for a married woman. Seeing the dreamer henna on her feet in a dream is evidence that she She will live a largely stable and comfortable life with her husband, and will also gain abundant wealth. Seeing the inscription of H

title: The 30 most important interpretations of seeing orange in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the color orange in a dream: Colors are among the things that can form in our dreams in anything. They can appear in the clothes, cars, or accessories that we wear, and each color has its own meaning that it interprets, such as the color orange in the fingertips. It has many interpretations depending on the condition of the one who sees it in the dream. The color orange in the dream. Dream There are many things that can be indicated by the presence of the color orange in a dream, perhaps the most important of which are the following: Its presence in a dream indicates a kind of liberation or liberation. It could be reconciliation with oneself and liberation from all internal restrictions of the individual, or liberation from the prison of injustice, or a state in which a person is freed from a serious illness in the body. In all cases, this color indicates goodness. Whoever sleeps and sees in a dream that he is wearing one of the things Or the appearance of this color in his home and the like, it portends a lot. Success for the student and the business owner means a lot of profit and personal gains in his business. This color indicates renewed activity within the person, as it is a symbol of the color of the sun and the glow of internal energy in the human body, which leads to self-confidence and achievement. Self and overcoming difficulties. Sometimes it indicates the need to pay attention to all the things that a person can do in his life, and the dreamer can see that he is walking on one of the roads that have signs of this color, which means that the road is safe. However, caution must be exercised. The color orange in a dream symbolizes the availability of good luck in one’s life, and its appearance on farms means that many things will happen in the coming periods, which will be a reason for happiness for the entire family. Interpretation of the color orange in a dream by Ibn SirinThe great translator Ibn Sirin explained His opinion and diligence in seeing the color orange in a dream, and this can be explained as follows: He explains that whoever sees this color in his dream wearing it if he has a job, this is evidence that he will obtain many positive promotions in the field of work in the coming period and his financial income will increase to Extremely. Taking off one of the clothes or things that contain this color indicates that the person has suffered a great material or moral loss, which he hoped to gain as quickly as possible. The presence of this color in any of the foods that the person eats indicates that He has a lot of internal energy and he tries in every way to achieve himself and pursue the goals that he wants to achieve in his life. Ibn Sirin confirms that seeing water in a dream when its color turns orange indicates that there is a lot of good and joyful news that the dreamer receives, in addition to abundant goodness. Which stands in his way in all the fields he seeks. Receiving one of the gifts bearing the color orange indicates that the person having the vision will suffer from the loss of a family member, relative or friend. Interpretation of the color orange in a dream for a single woman: Its appearance in a dream may indicate for an unmarried woman. The married woman feels the joy she will feel when she achieves it

title: The meaning of the interpretation of yellow hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi in good and evil

preview.html: The interpretation of yellow hair in a dream depends on the opinion of the most famous Muslim scholars who specialize in dream interpretation. You will find it in this article on the encyclopedia website. Dreams are a huge world, and every sign and sign that a person sees in his dream has a specific meaning and meaning, and these dreams sometimes cause a wave of anxiety and fear, but the Muslim submits his entire cause to God, because everyone’s fate is in the hands of God alone, and these interpretations are only interpretations, and the Muslim must deal with them. With intelligence and intelligence to take advantage of all the opportunities available to him and achieve achievements in life. Interpretation of yellow hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin Yellow is a bright and cheerful color that indicates joy and happiness, so yellow hair or yellow clothes or the like is a good sign for the future and great and positive changes in the future, God willing. Yellow hair indicates beauty and radiance. It can indicate good health and blessings in the diet, God willing. The yellow color indicates a change in the dreamer’s condition to a better one, God willing. If the yellow color is annoying, it may mean deep sadness for the dreamer. If the color changes From black to red, this indicates that the dreamer is dissatisfied with his situation and wants to change it and hopes for the best. Yellow color can be a sign or sign that someone is jealous of the dreamer or has a grudge against him and he must observe the legal rukiya recommended by the Prophet to protect himself from evil souls. The patient. The color black can indicate a major, sudden event that will affect the dreamer and he needs to be careful and think logically in order to be able to deal with it. The color yellow indicates a positive change in psychological, material, health, and social matters. Interpretation of yellow hair in a dream according to Nabulus. Yellow hair color may indicate a General or yellow in particular indicates that the dreamer will suffer from some disease or suffer from a severe headache or faint. Seeing yellow hair can mean that someone close to the dreamer is lurking evil, and therefore he should not trust everyone easily. Yellow is a color that evokes hope and pleasure, and seeing it shows A narrow solution to the problems he faces and the crises he faces. This may be a sign that the dreamer will be able to get rid of his debts and all the crises he faces. Since the yellow color usually indicates a blessing, seeing it indicates long life, God willing, for the dreamer, and good health. It may indicate The yellow color indicates that God will give him a lot of money and a lot of sustenance, God willing. If the dreamer is sad about the color of his yellow hair, this means that he is mentally and physically exhausted and needs to change and look for something that will add hope to his life. If the hair is yellow, short and tired, this means that there is Problems and crises that you will face in the near future and you must prepare for them. Yellow hair indicates a change in a person’s situation and circumstances and he must adapt and adapt to this change. Interpretation of a dream about yellow hair for a single woman: If a single girl’s hair is not yellow and her hair is black during the day, this means that someone is jealous And envy and wants to take the blessing from him

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person washing a living person

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dead person washing a living person in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees that the deceased has washed her in a dream and she is happy about that. It appears that she will put an end to all the problems and sad affairs that she is going through in her life. And if an unmarried woman sees in a dream that the deceased is washing her in her home in The dream and she was very pure. This indicates that she will live a stable life in her life, whether in her studies or work, God willing. And the unmarried girl who asks the unknown dead person to wash her in a dream while she sees him. This means that she will obtain many and beautiful good things in her life, God willing. And the girl An unmarried woman who looks at a dead person close to her as he washes her and sees her in a dream. There is evidence here that she will marry a righteous man who will live a good life, God willing. See also: A dead person’s illness in a dream. Interpretation of watching a dead person wash a living person in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees If a married woman asks a deceased person to wash her in a dream, he will laugh a lot. It explains the meaning that the marital problems she faces will end and she will live normally. Comfortable. And the married woman who sees the dead person washing the living in a dream in front of her and sees them announces that she will experience good things in her life, and an abundance of sustenance and goodness, God willing. And if the married woman sees the dead person washing her children in a dream in front of her. A clear indication of an abundance of food, and a lot of goodness is that They will come to them, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a dead person washing a living person in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that a dead person was washing a living person in front of her in a dream, and she sees them. It announces goodness and abundance in this period of her life, and God is the Most High, All-Knowing. And the divorced woman saw that the dead person was washing a living person in front of her in a dream, and she sees them. He washed her in a dream and she was happy about it. It explains that she has gotten rid of many difficult things in her life, and God knows best. The dreaming divorced woman who in the dream looks at the dead while she washes the living. This indicates that she will be liberated from her sins, and that she will repent to God Almighty, and his repentance is God’s sincere advice. And the divorced woman The one who asks the dead person to wash her in a dream and she is very happy. The meaning states that she gets rid of the difficulties that she is experiencing and experiencing. The interpretation of seeing a dead person washing a living person in a dream is for a man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees that the dead person is washing living people in front of him, and looks at them in a dream. It announces the end of major problems. Which he will face, God willing, in this period. And knowing that the dreamer took a bath in a dream from a dead person whom he knew. The meaning indicates the great comfort that this person will see in his life, God willing. And if the dreamer looks at the dead person in the dream while he is washing him and laughing with him, it is an indication of transgression. The difficult things that he lives and that he sees in his life, and God knows best. And the dreamer seeing in a dream that a dead person is near him, and he asks him to wash him in the dream. The meaning indicates that this dreamer’s livelihood is abundant and good, God willing. Read also: Interpretation of a dream in which a dead person is accompanied with him to The living meaning of seeing the dead

title: Interpretation of seeing my husband’s brother’s wife in a dream

preview.html: The dream of the husband's brother reflects the condition of the husband himself and the circumstances he is going through. Interpretation of seeing my husband's brother's wife in a dream about a single girl This vision in the dream of an unmarried girl indicates the end of family disputes. Solving family problems and restoring friendship and stability between relatives. Seeing the husband's brother's wife laughing and joking in a dream. Evidence that the dreamer will be exposed to difficult circumstances and situations, God knows best. Crying in a dream is comfort and goodness that comes from the dreamer, and her laughing out loud in a dream is sadness, worry and grief. When you see a single girl dancing with her predecessor in a dream. She is busy with worldly matters, far from obeying God, and neglects to perform his duties. Seeing the husband's brother in a dream of an unmarried woman means that her marriage is near, God willing. It is said that this dream comes from the desire and desire to marry. Interpretation of seeing my husband's brother's wife in a dream about a married woman If a married woman sees that her predecessor is pregnant in a dream, this is good news about her pregnancy if she is eligible for pregnancy, God knows best. And if the dreamer is barren or old, transferring the loan in a dream is evidence of many worries and sorrows. Seeing the deceased beating her husband's brother's wife In a dream, it is a sign that this woman will do something wrong that will make her the center of everyone's criticism. Seeing the husband's brother's wife divorced in court. A sign that the predecessor will be subject to a large fine or penalty, God knows best. And whoever saw her husband's sister was sick and was taken to the hospital. This is interpreted as her predecessor being exposed to a great test that will continue with her for a while. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a wedding in a dream Interpretation of seeing my wife's sister's husband in a dream about a man and its meaning When a man sees his wife's sister's husband in a dream, this indicates family ties and urges the wife to honor her family. And whoever sees his partner greeting him in a dream, this is a sign of friendship between them and they may soon meet in a business partnership. If a man hits his partner or quarrels with him in a dream, this is a good vision for exchanging benefits and interests between the two sides. Seeing the wife's sister in a dream reflects the wife's condition. If she is happy and smiling, the wife is in good condition. The meaning of seeing my husband's brother's wife pregnant in a dream and its interpretation Seeing my husband's brother's wife in a pregnant woman's dream expresses the good relationship that connects the dreamer to her husband's family. A quarrel with the husband's brother's wife in a dream for a pregnant woman means many disagreements and problems between the dreamer and her husband's family. Seeing the divorced sister-in-law in a pregnant woman's dream indicates separation from friends and traveling abroad for work and collecting money. And whoever sees her husband's sister sick in a dream, she suffers a lot in her pregnancy. The death of the sister-in-law in a dream is a difficult birth, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman sees her nephew in a dream, this is evidence of the birth of a healthy and healthy man, God willing. Read also: I dreamed that I married someone I know who is married Interpretation of seeing my wife's sister's husband in a dream for young men and its meaning This vision in a young man's dream indicates that the dreamer is thinking about marriage and looking for the right partner for his life and dreams. Seeing the wife's sister in a young man's dream is a sign that the dreamer will

title: What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream about eating red watermelon?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating red watermelon: Red watermelon is one of the fruits that appear in the summer and is loved by everyone, young and old, because it helps lower the body temperature. However, when the dreamer sees that he is eating red watermelon in his dream, he is searching for the meaning of this vision and its various interpretations to interpret it, and through this article we will explain in detail. Meanings and interpretations of this vision. Interpretation of a dream about eating red watermelon by Ibn Sirinama. Interpretation of a dream about eating red watermelon? Eating red watermelon in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s upcoming discoveries and relief from his worries and problems. Seeing yourself eating red watermelon is a sign of stable family conditions and a happy life. Eating Red watermelon is evidence that the dreamer feels reassured and secure. If the dreamer works in trade and sees that he was eating a red watermelon in his dream, then this vision is a sign of a business deal that he will participate in and in which he will make a lot of money and profits. When the dreamer sees that he is eating a watermelon Red shows his ability to make good decisions because of his wisdom and logical and sound thinking. Interpretation of a dream about eating red watermelon by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained that eating red watermelon in a dream is an indication of God’s abundant and expansive providence for the coming. It has also been reported that eating red watermelon is evidence that God will gain power and influence. And prestige. If the dreamer is imprisoned or enslaved, then his vision of a red watermelon, as narrated by Ibn Sirin, will be a message to him that he will finally obtain his freedom. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, search on Google, the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site. Interpretation of a dream about eating red watermelon for a single woman. Eating red watermelon In a dream for an unmarried woman, it is a sign of her close marriage with a suitable person who has money and a prominent position. When a girl sees in her dream that she is eating red watermelon, this is a sign of her success and superiority in her life and achieving her goals. For a girl to dream of eating red watermelon is an example of her good health and that she She is not susceptible to diseases, and if she sees that she is eating watermelon during its season, this indicates the abundance of goodness that will come her way soon. , but if it is not in season, then this vision is a sign of problems and fears that this girl will face. If the girl ate a red watermelon in her dream and its taste was good and delicious, then this is evidence of the life full of luxury and happiness that she will live, but if it was spoiled or its taste was bad This indicates that. She is exposed to some health problems. Interpretation of a dream about eating red watermelon for a married woman. When a married woman eats red watermelon and she is happy and enjoying her sleep, this indicates the approaching date of her pregnancy, which will please her heart and the heart of her husband. Eating red watermelon in the winter in a married woman’s dream is an indication of some changes that She was waiting for it to happen. If a married woman eats a red watermelon, this is evidence that her husband will receive a great livelihood and a lot of kindness. Eating red watermelon in a dream means that he will receive a family inheritance or an amount of money that he did not seek to obtain.
